name: To validate whether Carbon credits is present in response

steps.name: Given I set base URL to "context.base_url"
When I make a "GET" request to "/Categories/6327/Details.json?catalogue=false"
Then the response status code should equal "200"
And json path ".Name" in response should be "Carbon credits"

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Validate the API responses according to the Acceptance Criteria
